Question.Subject: why isn't my chatroulette working?i?
Question.Content: i think my mom may have blocked it, lol . but i made it so internet always allowed itt .. everytime i try to open it on google chrome, it directs me to the web adress about:blank and it doesnt load.. help?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Type in the web address directly. Try a different web browser if it still doesn't work in chrome.

Answer.Content: Type in the web address directly. Try a different web browser if it still doesn't work in chrome.

Answer.Reference:
THAT'S ALL MY PAGE SAYS ...
" I think the website is down / broken "

Answer.Content:
the site is running pretty slow because of the growth spurt they had over the past month. this should level out over the next month or so as they update the site to handle the new load of people.
also try to clear your browser's cache just in case that's causing problems.
you can always try these sites as well: http://shufflepeople.com http://woome.com
or read a bigger list of cam sites here http://blog.shufflepeople.com/index.php/2010/03/complete-list-of-webcam-chat-sites-online/

omegle is just the same as CR except gives you the option to not have video at all. but if you really want CR then try using a different browser? mozilla firefox works well. and about your mom, if you open up a new google chrome browser, then click cntrl+shirt+N, that opens up a new window that doesn't save your history so your mom won't know about it. happy chatting...
